content: 5 until 28 32 36 sts rem ending with round 5 created a quick and dirty tutorial to show you all of the steps taken 14 16 18 sts on each of the front and back needles to complete the heel turn and the stitches pick up this video assumes you are comfortable with p2tog ssk and sl 1 finishing break yarn leaving a 12-inch tail using the kitchener stitch how to work a gusset heel tutorial http //tinyurl com/yakln2wj close the toe of your sock make a second sock identical to the first weave in the ends wet block and allow to dry completely rock your new socks page 3 of 3 @notsorryknitter on ravelry instagram ello & twitter | unapologeticknitter com | the unapologetic knitter on facebook & youtube
